news.title: The drying up of wells and lakes. What future awaits Eastern Greater Poland and Bełchatów?
news.description: Water shortages are the number one challenge of the modern world. In Poland, the problem is exceptionally pressing, and poor water management will exacerbate it. Experts have examined regions particularly vulnerable to drought issues: Eastern Greater Poland and Bełchatów. The first one already has planned actions aimed at improving the water situation. The latter should follow suit as soon as possible.
